content.1: The word that Jeremiah the prophet spake unto Baruch the son of Neriah, when he had written these words in a book at the mouth of Jeremiah, in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, saying,
content.3: Thou didst say, Woe is me now! for the
content.4: Thus shalt thou say unto him, The
content.5: And seekest thou great things for thyself? seek
